text: "Rainy Dayz" is a 2002 song by Mary J. Blige featuring Ja Rule. It was taken from her fifth studio album No More Drama. It went to number 12 in the United States, number 17 in the United Kingdom, number 29 in Scotland and Australia, number 25 in Ireland and number 13 in the Netherlands. ==Track listings== CD 1 # "Rainy Dayz" (featuring Ja Rule) (album version) # "Rainy Dayz" (featuring Ja Rule) (Thunderpuss radio edit) # "Rainy Dayz" (featuring Ja Rule) (Thunderpuss club mix) # "Rainy Dayz" (featuring Ja Rule) (Thunderdub) CD 2 # "Rainy Dayz" (featuring Ja Rule) (Thunderpuss Remix) # "Let No Man Put Asunder" (Maurice Joshua Remix) # "Sexy" (featuring Jadakiss) Category:2002 songs Category:Mary J. Blige songs Category:Ja Rule songs
title: Rainy Dayz
